targets.rawSql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_posts FROM x_posts WHERE created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND created_at <= $__timeTo();
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_posts FROM discord_messages WHERE created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND created_at <= $__timeTo() AND author_is_bot = false;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_posts FROM telegram_messages WHERE created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND created_at <= $__timeTo();

WITH ambassador_activity AS (SELECT 'Discord' AS platform, COALESCE(author_display_name, author_username) AS ambassador_name, author_username AS username, COUNT(*) AS posts FROM discord_messages WHERE created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND created_at <= $__timeTo() AND author_is_bot = false GROUP BY author_display_name, author_username UNION ALL SELECT 'Telegram' AS platform, COALESCE(tu.first_name || ' ' || tu.last_name, tu.first_name) AS ambassador_name, tu.username, COUNT(*) AS posts FROM telegram_messages tm JOIN telegram_users tu ON tm.user_id = tu.user_id WHERE tm.created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND tm.created_at <= $__timeTo() GROUP BY tu.first_name, tu.last_name, tu.username UNION ALL SELECT 'X (Twitter)' AS platform, username AS ambassador_name, username, COUNT(*) AS posts FROM x_posts WHERE created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND created_at <= $__timeTo() GROUP BY username) SELECT ambassador_name AS "Ambassador", username AS "Username", SUM(CASE WHEN platform = 'Discord' THEN posts ELSE 0 END) AS "Discord Posts", SUM(CASE WHEN platform = 'Telegram' THEN posts ELSE 0 END) AS "Telegram Posts", SUM(CASE WHEN platform = 'X (Twitter)' THEN posts ELSE 0 END) AS "X Posts", SUM(posts) AS "Total Posts" FROM ambassador_activity GROUP BY ambassador_name, username ORDER BY SUM(posts) DESC LIMIT 20;

WITH platform_posts AS (SELECT 'Discord' AS platform, COUNT(*) AS posts FROM discord_messages WHERE created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND created_at <= $__timeTo() AND author_is_bot = false UNION ALL SELECT 'Telegram' AS platform, COUNT(*) AS posts FROM telegram_messages WHERE created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND created_at <= $__timeTo() UNION ALL SELECT 'X (Twitter)' AS platform, COUNT(*) AS posts FROM x_posts WHERE created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND created_at <= $__timeTo()) SELECT platform AS "Platform", posts AS "Posts" FROM platform_posts WHERE posts > 0 ORDER BY posts DESC;

WITH daily_activity AS (SELECT date_trunc('day', created_at) AS time, 'Discord' AS platform, COUNT(*) AS posts FROM discord_messages WHERE created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND created_at <= $__timeTo() AND author_is_bot = false GROUP BY date_trunc('day', created_at) UNION ALL SELECT date_trunc('day', created_at) AS time, 'Telegram' AS platform, COUNT(*) AS posts FROM telegram_messages WHERE created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND created_at <= $__timeTo() GROUP BY date_trunc('day', created_at) UNION ALL SELECT date_trunc('day', created_at) AS time, 'X (Twitter)' AS platform, COUNT(*) AS posts FROM x_posts WHERE created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND created_at <= $__timeTo() GROUP BY date_trunc('day', created_at)) SELECT time, platform AS metric, posts AS value FROM daily_activity ORDER BY time, platform;
SELECT username AS "Ambassador", COUNT(*) AS "X Posts" FROM x_posts WHERE created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND created_at <= $__timeTo() GROUP BY username ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT COALESCE(author_display_name, author_username) AS "Ambassador", COUNT(*) AS "Discord Posts" FROM discord_messages WHERE created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND created_at <= $__timeTo() AND author_is_bot = false GROUP BY author_display_name, author_username ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT COALESCE(tu.first_name || ' ' || tu.last_name, tu.first_name) AS "Ambassador", COUNT(*) AS "Telegram Posts" FROM telegram_messages tm JOIN telegram_users tu ON tm.user_id = tu.user_id WHERE tm.created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND tm.created_at <= $__timeTo() GROUP BY tu.first_name, tu.last_name ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 10;

WITH weekly_activity AS (SELECT date_trunc('week', created_at) AS time, 'Discord' AS platform, COUNT(*) AS posts FROM discord_messages WHERE created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND created_at <= $__timeTo() AND author_is_bot = false GROUP BY date_trunc('week', created_at) UNION ALL SELECT date_trunc('week', created_at) AS time, 'Telegram' AS platform, COUNT(*) AS posts FROM telegram_messages WHERE created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND created_at <= $__timeTo() GROUP BY date_trunc('week', created_at) UNION ALL SELECT date_trunc('week', created_at) AS time, 'X (Twitter)' AS platform, COUNT(*) AS posts FROM x_posts WHERE created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND created_at <= $__timeTo() GROUP BY date_trunc('week', created_at)) SELECT time, platform AS metric, posts AS value FROM weekly_activity ORDER BY time, platform;
